a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Number of patents filed for renewable energy technologies, World, 2000 to
Global number of patents filed under each renewable technology category per year. Note that figures for 2014-16 may be
subject to a time lag; processing times of patent applications vary and some patents submitted over this period may not yet be
recorded in statistics. These figures will be updated with time if additional patent applications are recorded.
